text: (manitarkale!) Urntu cellakkutiya (uyirp piranikal) anaittaiyum allah orevita tanniraik kontu pataittirunta potilum (avai anaittum oru vakaiyaka irukkavillai.) Avarril cila tan vayirral (pampukalaip pol) urntu celkinrana. Avarril cila iru kalkalal natakkinrana. Avarril cila nanku kalkalal natakkinrana. (Ivvaru) allah tan virumpiyavarrai (virumpiyavaru) pataippan. Niccayamaka allah anaittin mitum mikka arralutaiyavan avan
